content: Hello everyone, I've been working on https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/proposal-about-out-of-lifetime-references/11675/11 for a few days and I've gathered some examples on how it would impact Rust. It would be great to hear your opinion on this!
@vincent163 t-compiler is about compiler implementation, you need to contact t-lang if you want to see changes to the language...
